titles.title: Hospice Support Act of 2009
To amend the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 to eliminate the phase out of the Medicare hospice budget neutrality adjustment factor.
Hospice Support Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Hospice Support Act of 2009 - Amends the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 to eliminate phase out of the Medicare hospice budget neutralilty adjustment factor.
